abstract: The sort descriptors of the fetch request.
overview:
## Discussion

The sort descriptors specify how the objects returned when the [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSFetchRequest] is issued should be ordered—for example, by last name and then by first name. The sort descriptors are applied in the order in which they appear in the `sortDescriptors` array (serially in lowest-array-index-first order).

A value of `nil` is treated as no sort descriptors.

# sortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

The sort descriptors of the fetch request.

## Declaration

```swift
var sortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The sort descriptors specify how the objects returned when the [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSFetchRequest] is issued should be ordered—for example, by last name and then by first name. The sort descriptors are applied in the order in which they appear in the `sortDescriptors` array (serially in lowest-array-index-first order).

A value of `nil` is treated as no sort descriptors.
title: sortDescriptors
